message: Analyze Github commits to know which convention is popular.
story: Mostafa Hussein shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Popular Coding Convention on Github
caption: sideeffect.kr
description: I made this project about a year ago. At that time, I just started it for The GitHub Data Challenge II. So, it was very simple and concise implementaion for proof of concept. I've been aggregated convention data for a year. However, It is not analyze conventions of our codes deeply. I think thereforâ€¦

data.message:
Today I discovered that there are people who put their braces in the same line WITHOUT a space before it! And I thought same-line braces were bad enough :D
Edit: and what's up with spaces around the args/parameters? I find this very redundant :D
It may sound weird but I do it with JavaScript only because I don't respect it :P .. But in C++ I don't ever use same line braces because I respect it :D
